snippet: With her Italian publisher as liaison, the author who writes under the pseudonym Elena Ferrante answered questions from Rachel Donadio of The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: With her Italian publisher as liaison, the author who writes under the pseudonym Elena Ferrante answered questions from Rachel Donadio of The New York Times.

headline.main: ‘Writing Has Always Been a Great Struggle for Me’
headline.print_headline: An Email Chat With Elena Ferrante
